LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.label: tunnel invasion
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.letterText: Earthquake waves were detected.\n\nA special ratkin unit trained by will soon come up from the ground. We have to stop them before they paralyze the facility.
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.label: ratkin hole
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.letterText: A rat hole has been found.\n\nTo stop it before they steal it.
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.label: follow-up unit
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.letterText: EMP explosion, waiting outside, came in.\n\nWe need to prepare for the defense.
